stepTitle: The average velocity of the rocket over the time interval: [9, $$9.01]$$ is $$-9.849$$. The average velocity of the rocket over the time interval: $$[8.99$$, 9] is $$-9.751$$. The average velocity of the rocket over the time interval: [9, $$9.001]$$ is $$-9.8049$$. The average velocity of the rocket over the time interval: $$[8.999$$, 9] is $$-9.7951$$. Use these statements to guess the instantaneous velocity of the rocket at $$t=9$$ sec. Round to the nearest tenth.
